name: PROTEGA
description:
Protega is a cooperative spaceship game where each player controls a different part of the spaceship.

The four players must work together to navigate the ship around in a maze full of asteroids, in order to collect all stars.

The players have sixty seconds to get from star to star, requiring teamwork in order to win.

>>>> CONTROL

Joypads:

You need four controllers (preferably XBOX 360 for Windows).
Use right and left triggers to control.

Keyboard:

Blue - Z
Yellow - SPACE
Green - LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS
Pink - RIGHT SHIFT

Start game - ENTER
Restart game - F5
End game - ESCAPE

This game was developed during the KADK Fall Jam.
The theme of the jam was "Out of balance".

You can read more about the game on my Behance profile.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
